# Quick Start Guide (3 Minutes)

Get up and running with the resume portfolio project in under 3 minutes.

## Prerequisites

- Node.js >= 20.0.0
- npm or yarn
- Git

## Step 1: Clone & Install (30 seconds)

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/qws941/resume.git
cd resume

# Install dependencies
npm install
```

## Step 2: First Build (30 seconds)

```bash
# Generate worker.js from source files
npm run build

# This creates typescript/portfolio-worker/worker.js (auto-generated, ~152KB)
# DO NOT edit worker.js directly!
```

## Step 3: Local Preview (30 seconds)

```bash
# Start Wrangler dev server
npm run dev

# Open browser: http://localhost:8787
# âœ… You should see the portfolio homepage
```

## Step 4: Run Tests (60 seconds)

```bash
# Unit tests (24 tests)
npm test

# E2E tests (34 tests)
npm run test:e2e

# If all tests pass â†’ You're ready to develop!
```

## Your First Change (30 seconds)

Let's add a new project to the portfolio:

```bash
# 1. Edit project data
vim typescript/portfolio-worker/data.json

# Add to "projects" array:
{
  "icon": "ğŸš€",
  "title": "My New Project",
  "tech": "Node.js, Docker",
  "description": "Description here",
  "liveUrl": "https://example.com",
  "githubUrl": "https://github.com/qws941/resume"
}

# 2. Rebuild
npm run build

# 3. Preview
npm run dev
# â†’ Check http://localhost:8787

# 4. Test
npm test && npm run test:e2e

# 5. Deploy (pushes to production)
git add .
git commit -m "feat: add new project"
git push origin master
# GitHub Actions will auto-deploy to https://resume.jclee.me
```

## Essential Commands Cheat Sheet

```bash
# Development
npm run dev            # Local dev server (port 8787)
npm run build          # Generate worker.js (REQUIRED before deploy)

# Testing
npm test               # Unit tests
npm run test:e2e       # E2E tests (requires build)
npm run lint           # Lint check

# Deployment
npm run deploy         # Build + deploy via REST API
git push origin master # Auto-deploy via GitHub Actions

# Health check
curl https://resume.jclee.me/health
```

## File You'll Edit Most

| File                                    | Purpose        | When to Edit                 |
| --------------------------------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `typescript/portfolio-worker/data.json`                         | Project data   | Add/remove/update projects   |
| `typescript/portfolio-worker/styles.css`                        | All CSS        | Change colors, fonts, layout |
| `typescript/portfolio-worker/index.html`                        | HTML structure | Modify page structure        |
| `typescript/portfolio-worker/worker.js` | **NEVER EDIT** | Auto-generated by build      |

## Critical Workflow (Memorize This!)

```
Edit sources â†’ Build â†’ Test â†’ Deploy
     â†“           â†“       â†“       â†“
data.json    npm run   npm    git push
styles.css    build    test   origin master
index.html
```

**âš ï¸ Always run `npm run build` after editing source files!**

## What Not to Do

âŒ **NEVER**:

- Edit `typescript/portfolio-worker/worker.js` directly (auto-generated)
- Deploy without running `npm run build`
- Run E2E tests without building first
- Commit without testing
- Modify HTML placeholders (`<!-- CSS_PLACEHOLDER -->`, etc.)

âœ… **ALWAYS**:

- Edit source files (`data.json`, `styles.css`, `index.html`)
- Run `npm run build` after changes
- Test before committing (`npm test && npm run test:e2e`)
- Preview locally (`npm run dev`)

## Project Structure (Key Directories)

```
resume/
â”œâ”€â”€ typescript/portfolio-worker/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ data.json          # âœï¸ Edit: Project data
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ styles.css         # âœï¸ Edit: All CSS
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.html         # âœï¸ Edit: HTML structure
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ generate-worker.js # Build script (rarely edit)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ worker.js          # âŒ Never edit: Auto-generated
â”œâ”€â”€ tests/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ unit/              # Jest tests
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ e2e/               # Playwright tests
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/                  # Documentation
â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/               # Deployment scripts
â””â”€â”€ master/                # Master resume versions
```

## Common Issues & Quick Fixes

### Issue 1: E2E Tests Fail After Adding Project

**Error**: `Expected 11 projects, found 12`

**Fix**:

```bash
# Update test expectations
vim tests/e2e/portfolio.spec.js
# Change line 13: PROJECTS: 12  (was 11)

npm run test:e2e  # Should pass now
```

### Issue 2: Site Shows Old Content After Deploy

**Cause**: Forgot to run `npm run build`

**Fix**:

```bash
npm run build      # Regenerate worker.js
git add typescript/portfolio-worker/worker.js
git commit --amend --no-edit
git push origin master --force
```

### Issue 3: CSP Violation in Browser Console

**Cause**: CSP hashes outdated after HTML/CSS changes

**Fix**:

```bash
npm run build      # Recalculates CSP hashes
npm test           # Verify hashes
npm run deploy     # Deploy with new hashes
```

## Next Steps

1. **Read the full documentation**:
   - `OpenCode.md` - Complete development guide
   - `docs/guides/ARCHITECTURE.md` - System architecture
   - `docs/guides/TESTING_GUIDE.md` - Testing strategy

2. **Explore the codebase**:
   - Check `typescript/portfolio-worker/generate-worker.js` - Build pipeline
   - Review `typescript/portfolio-worker/data.json` - Data structure
   - Inspect `tests/unit/generate-worker.test.js` - Test examples

3. **Make your first contribution**:
   - Add a new project
   - Update resume card
   - Improve styling
   - Add a new feature

4. **Join monitoring**:
   - Grafana: https://grafana.jclee.me
   - Health check: https://resume.jclee.me/health
   - Metrics: https://resume.jclee.me/metrics
